analysis.description:
CryptantCrabPurchasableLaunch._refundExceededValue (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1139-1142) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_exceededValue) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1141)

Reentrancy in CryptantCrabMarket.buyCrab (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1872-1929):
	External calls:
	- cryptantCrabToken.safeTransferFrom(address(this),msg.sender,marketItem.tokenId) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1885-1888)
	- prizePool.increasePrizePool.value(_prizePoolCut)(currentPrizePool) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1902-1907)
	- _fossilType = cryptantCrabStorage.readUint256(keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(marketItem.tokenId,fossilType))) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1907-1912)
	External calls sending eth:
	- marketItem.seller.transfer(_sellerAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1897-1899)
	- prizePool.increasePrizePool.value(_prizePoolCut)(currentPrizePool) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1902-1907)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- internalUintVariable (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1918-1923)
	- internalUintVariable (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1923-1925)
	- marketItems (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1917)

	External calls sending eth:

	- _referral.transfer(_referralReward) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4800ffc4f8baa08cb50f4dba1843f8a4eddb28e5.sol#1781)

	State variables written after the call(s):
